code:
git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
git config --global user.name "Your Name"
title: git

details: switch user and choose which shell to use
title: git

code:
git config --global credential.helper cache
git config --local credential.helper cache
git config --global --unset credential.helper
title: git

details: disable credential helper for single command
title: git

code:
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh
sh get-docker.sh
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
newgrp docker
title: docker

code:
docker run \
    ...
    --health-cmd "set -e;  nc -zv localhost 22; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi" \
    --health-interval=10s 
    ...
title: docker

code:
monkeytype run foo.py
...
monkeytype apply foo.bar
title: python
python

code:
# https://go.dev/doc/install
wget <tar_from_https://go.dev/doc/install>
rm -rf /usr/local/go && tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.20.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo ln -s /usr/local/go/bin/go /usr/bin/go
#sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go && sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.20.3.linux-amd64.tar.gz
title: go

code:
# view jobs
jobs
# send job to background and stop
ctrl  + z
# resume background job
bg [job id]
# switch to job
fg [job id]
# run command as background job
tail -f log.txt &
title: linux

details: list all listening ports and associated services
title: linux

code:
new window - CTRL + b + c
     switch window - CTRL + b + [0-9]+
  vertical split | - CTRL + b + %
 horizonal split _ - CTRL + b + "
   navigate panels - CTRL + b + ↑ / ↓ / ← / →
title: tmux

code:
#             < query >
redis-cli keys rq:res* | awk '{print $1}' | xargs redis-cli del
details: find keys and pipe to delete
title: redis

details: pass file to curl as data
title: curl

code:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg
sudo mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings
curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/gpgkey/nodesource-repo.gpg.key | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg
sudo chmod 644 /etc/apt/keyrings/nodesource.gpg
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install nodejs -y
sudo npm install -g typescript
sudo chwon ubuntu -R /usr/lib/node_modules/typescript 
sudo chwon ubuntu /usr/lib/node_modules/typescript
title: typescript
